channel.title: Rsc Domination BACK ONLINE- Join now
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/zmb58l.png[/img] Welcome to the advertisement of Rsc Domination P2P . This is a PVP/STAKING/PKING based server, with custom content worth giving a try. The purpose of Domination p2p is not to replicate but to give players a fun easy going environment to STAKE,PK, and SKILL in. This is not a no-life server you will have to break sleep or afk 24/7 to accomplish your goals. I would like to build a competitive environment rewarding players that take advantage of the opportunity. Rares will not be donated for they will be given based off reward/event systems accordingly. Domination p2p is totally free. P2P just means that the server is both f2p and p2p based and will not be changed to just one or the other. We also welcome skilling with open arms still keeping all skills intact and even added rune crafting, with implemented facilities including a skill island with skill total requirements needed to gain entry. Anything left out of this advertisement will have to be embraced during your experience here at Rsc Domination.
Starting items: Iron 2h, Ruby Amulet, Sleeping bag.
Starting location: Edgeville.
RATES: MID/HIGH
Website information: www.rscdomination.net
client download: [url=http://uppit.com/bfuea8r93xz7/Client_download_v6_4.18.14.zip]http://uppit.com/bfuea8r93xz7/Client_download_v6_4.18.14.zip[/url]
Media:
Key minigame : Defeat monsters, obtain keys, turn in for prize. [img]http://i.imgur.com/r0n1vHi.png[/img]
Gambling: Gamble money, take a risk see what you get . [img]http://i.imgur.com/Q6vZbe4.png[/img]
PVP ARENA : Enter this competition and leave as the last man standing to receiver a jackpot reward totaled up from 50k entree fees. There is no limit on how many can join just a limited time to enter the contest. you can start this at the pvp usher. [img]http://i.imgur.com/vLdMwKk.png[/img]
Marble Mini game: Defeat specific npcs for a marble reward that can be exchanged at a vendor in return for prizes. [img]http://i.imgur.com/bohDqpn.png[/img]
Some customs: [img]http://i.imgur.com/lxogw28.png[/img]
Custom NPCS:
Roa: (some rarer items) [img]http://i.imgur.com/rVM20Ds.png[/img]
Spike: (Legendary armor drop) [img]http://i.imgur.com/1v91cR5.png[/img]
Charlie: (Mythical Armor drop) [img]http://i.imgur.com/YmE4g0x.png[/img]
Noobs getting owned: [img]http://i.imgur.com/HGUALMZ.png[/img]
Dont lose out on progress, pickup where you left off! All player files exist still. [img]http://i.imgur.com/0obNCFL.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/o3DSGK6.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/COjk9z3.png[/img]
Hope to see you in game at www.rscdomination.net
